alert.note: Alert for Aguila Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued December 17 at 1:09AM MST until December 18 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 8 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures in the lower 30s expected. * WHERE...Aguila Valley. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 8 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
